name: Bloomiquin

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.desc: Contact with the posessor may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll (Secret)
abilities.desc: Boosts the posessor's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

description: Bloomiquin are believed to be the most beautiful creature in this region, to the point of becoming a symbol for many beauty contests. It is very rare to see a Bloomiquin due to the difficulty of evolving them. Moreover, they hold pride in their look and often avoid all physical contacts, including battles.
